entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023
